newsitem.title: USA: Argentina's Perez buys Unistar stake.
newsitem.headline: Argentina's Perez buys Unistar stake.

text.p: Argentina's Perez Companc SA said Monday that it acquired the 50 percent of the capital stock of Unistar SA it did not already own for $11 million.
With the purchase, Perez now owns all Unistar's capital stock through its units, PASA SA, which holds 99.9 percent, and Maipu Inversora, with 0.1 percent.

Unistar makes and markets raw materials for the plastics industry. Perez has interests in oil and gas production and refining, electricity generation, transmission and distribution, construction, engineering, real estate and telecommunications. It is based in Buenos Aires.
